title: Font Title Meaning?
content:
What does CE stand for? Such as in FF Fago Normal CE Regular.

 [‹ Grouping of character widths](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310230900/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31468 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pairing with Arno ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310230900/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32165 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Asvetic

comments.content:
Thanks, now I have more ?s...  
Can I ask what the difference is between that and the regular version? Is it major?
CE fonts have characters you need to typeset in those languages. If you are only doing English, you don’t need them.
Ah, makes perfect sense. Much appreciation.
